pr_title: Add language param support for content recognition

timeline.bodyText: I think it's important to include that auto detect is default and that this forces the document to be analyzed in the given language: https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-python/blob/feature/formrecognizer2.1/sdk/formrecognizer/azure-ai-formrecognizer/azure/ai/formrecognizer/_form_recognizer_client.py#L450
timeline.author: kristapratico
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -60,4 +61,32 @@ public RecognizeContentOptions setPollInterval(final Duration pollInterval) { this.pollInterval = pollInterval == null ? DEFAULT_POLL_INTERVAL : pollInterval; return this; } + + /** + * Get the BCP-47 language code of the text in the document. + * See supported language codes here: + * + * https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/cognitive-services/form-recognizer/language-support. + * + * + * @return the language code for the text in the document. + */ + public String getLanguage() { + return language; + } + + /** + * Set the BCP-47 language code of the text in the document. + * See supported language codes here: + * + * https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/cognitive-services/form-recognizer/language-support. + * + * + * @param language the language code value to set.
